get_incident_report.origin: Southwest corner of fabrication shop, near HVAC ducting
get_incident_report.cause_determination: Under investigation — preliminary: accidental, electrical in origin. Fire investigator notes presence of welding equipment AND contractor HVAC tools near origin point. Cannot definitively attribute to contractor work vs. insured's own welding operations.
fire_investigator_notes: Origin area shows signs of both welding splatter and electrical arc damage
HVAC contractor (TempFlow Mechanical) had been working in origin area earlier that day
Insured's employees were also welding structural steel in adjacent bay — 15 feet from origin
Fire suppression system (sprinklers) activated but ONE head in origin zone found non-functional
Annual fire suppression inspection was 4 months overdue per building maintenance records
Security camera footage from adjacent bay is inconclusive — timestamp shows 2:47 PM, origin obscured by steel racks
